detail_desc: Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 22 pairs of studs and three pairs of hoops. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Trainers in chambray and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front, and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, padded hood. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Five pairs of studs and one pair with a chain and pendant.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

prod_name: Special OCC Mini Me Maddi dres
detail_desc: Lace dress with scalloped cap sleeves, a zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Padded slippers in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Lightweight puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood and discreet zip down the front with a chin guard. Pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long sleeves, a visible seam at the back and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Metal keyring with a shimmering mini backpack in imitation leather. The backpack has a zip at the top, embroidery and appliqués.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Running popover jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Hood with a narrow elasticated edge, a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Seam above the waist with a narrow, loose yoke, long raglan sleeves with narrow elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem with an elastic drawstring. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh at the top.
Shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports socks in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort. Reinforced toes and heels.
Small shoulder bag with a flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size approx. 7.5x15x18.5 cm.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Tuxedo jacket in twill with a contrasting colour shawl collar, a covered button at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with scalloped tops.
Ribbed V-neck top in airy jersey with a slight sheen, narrow shoulder straps and lace trims around the neckline and hem.

Long-sleeved dress in velour with a matching Santa hat. Dress with appliqués on the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Opening with a hook and loop fastener at the back and faux fur trims around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated neckline and raglan cap sleeves.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Sports trousers in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets with a taped zip, flap back pockets and gently tapered legs with elastic detailing at the hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fine-knit cardigan in a soft cotton blend with an all-over print. Double frills and buttons down the front.

V-neck blouse in soft patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered yoke at the back,gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist. The blouse is made from recycled polyester.

Long-sleeved dress in jersey crêpe containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a shimmering, tiered skirt in layers of tulle to create volume. Lined skirt.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a textured, stretch weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a rib-knit cotton and viscose blend. High waist with wide elastication and an overlocked edge at the hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in cool viscose jersey with a sightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Coat in a sturdy weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and a loose yoke with a pleat at the back. Side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and long sleeves with a narrow tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Lined.

Short, wide dress in sturdy cotton denim with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and a tier to the hem for added width. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a glow-in-the-dark print on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, flock print on the chest and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Large bag in imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 14x30x38 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Loose-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Underwired lace bras with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft cotton. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Bikini briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Nursing shirt in a cotton weave with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and a concealed zip in each side for easier nursing access. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in a Tencel™ modal weave with a high waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and detachable belt with D-rings. Pleats at the front, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.

Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, small jetted coin pocket at the front, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Tapered legs with narrow hems.
Flared, pleated, calf-length skirt in airy polyester with a high waist, concealed zip in one side seam and a soft belt with a metal buckle and eyelets.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
